from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
import json
from datetime import datetime
from notebookutils import mssparkutils

# Define variables
source_table = "odw_standardised_db.listed_building"
target_table = "odw_harmonised_db.listed_building"
primary_key = 'entity'

# Initialize tracking variables
start_exec_time = str(datetime.now())
insert_count = 0
update_count = 0
delete_count = 0

try:
    # Read and transform data from source
    logInfo(f"Reading data from {source_table}")
    results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT 
                        Listings.dataset
                        ,CAST(NULL AS LONG) AS ListedBuildingID
                        ,Listings.`end-date` AS endDate
                        ,Listings.entity AS entity
                        ,Listings.`entry-date` AS entryDate
                        ,Listings.geometry
                        ,Listings.`listed-building-grade` AS listedBuildingGrade
                        ,Listings.name
                        ,Listings.`organisation-entity` AS organisationEntity
                        ,Listings.point
                        ,Listings.prefix
                        ,Listings.reference
                        ,Listings.`start-date` AS startDate
                        ,Listings.typology
                        ,Listings.`documentation-url` AS documentationUrl
                        ,"0" as Migrated
                        ,"StandardisedDB" as ODTSourceSystem
                        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                        ,current_timestamp() AS IngestionDate
                        ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,'Y' as IsActive
                    FROM
                        {source_table} AS Listings
                """)
    # Initial write to create temp table structure
    logInfo(f"Initial write to {target_table}")
    results.write.format("delta").mode("Overwrite").option("overwriteSchema", "true").partitionBy("IsActive").saveAsTable(f"{target_table}")
    
    # Create calculations view for internal IDs and IsActive flags
    logInfo("Creating calculations for internal IDs and IsActive flags")
    spark.sql(f"""
        CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_listed_building_calculations_base
            AS
            SELECT  
                row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY {primary_key} ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
                ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, {primary_key} asc) AS ListedBuildingID
                ,{primary_key}
                ,IngestionDate
                ,ValidTo
                ,'0' AS Migrated
                ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY {primary_key} ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
                    WHEN 1 THEN
                        'Y'
                    ELSE
                        'N'
                END AS IsActive                
            FROM
                {target_table}
        """)
    
    # Get calculated values for internal IDs
    df_calcs = spark.sql(f"""
                            SELECT
                                CurrentRow.ListedBuildingID
                                ,CurrentRow.{primary_key} 
                                ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                                ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                                ,"0" AS Migrated
                                ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                            FROM
                                vw_listed_building_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                                LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_listed_building_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                    ON CurrentRow.{primary_key} = NextRow.{primary_key}
                                    AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                                ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                        """)
    
    df_calcs = df_calcs.withColumnRenamed(primary_key, f"temp_{primary_key}").withColumnRenamed("IngestionDate", "temp_IngestionDate")
    
    # Get final result set with all data and RowID
    results_final = spark.sql(f"""
                        SELECT DISTINCT 
                            {primary_key}
                            ,ListedBuildingID
                            ,dataset
                            ,endDate
                            ,entryDate
                            ,geometry
                            ,listedBuildingGrade
                            ,name
                            ,organisationEntity
                            ,point
                            ,prefix
                            ,reference
                            ,startDate
                            ,typology
                            ,documentationUrl
                            ,Migrated
                            ,ODTSourceSystem
                            ,IngestionDate
                            ,ValidTo
                            ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                    IFNULL(ListedBuildingID, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(entity, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(dataset, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(endDate, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(entryDate, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(geometry, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(listedBuildingGrade, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(name, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(organisationEntity, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(point, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(prefix, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(reference, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(startDate, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(typology, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(documentationUrl, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(Migrated, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(ODTSourceSystem, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(IngestionDate, '.'),
                                    IFNULL(ValidTo, '.')
                                )
                            ) AS RowID
                            ,IsActive
                        FROM 
                            {target_table}
                    """)
    
    # Prepare columns and join with calculations
    columns = results_final.columns
    results_clean = results_final.drop("ListedBuildingID", "ValidTo", "Migrated", "IsActive")
    
    # Final merge and deduplication
    logInfo(f"Merging and de-duplicating data")
    final_df = results_clean.join(df_calcs, (df_calcs[f"temp_{primary_key}"] == results_clean[primary_key]) & (df_calcs["temp_IngestionDate"] == results_clean["IngestionDate"])).select(columns)
    final_df = final_df.drop(primary_key).drop_duplicates()
    
    # Get record counts
    insert_count = final_df.count()
    
    # Final write
    logInfo(f"Writing final data to {target_table}")
    final_df.write.format("delta").mode("Overwrite").option("overwriteSchema", "true").partitionBy("IsActive").saveAsTable(f"{target_table}")
    
    end_exec_time = str(datetime.now())
    logInfo(f"Successfully processed {target_table} with {insert_count} records")
    
    # Add successful result to logger
    app_insight_logger.add_table_result(
        delta_table_name=target_table,
        insert_count=insert_count,
        update_count=update_count,
        delete_count=delete_count,
        table_result="success",
        start_exec_time=start_exec_time,
        end_exec_time=end_exec_time
    )
    
except Exception as e:
    # Handle errors with proper logging
    logError(f"Error processing {target_table}: {e}")
    error_message = app_insight_logger.format_error_message(e, max_length=800)
    
    end_exec_time = str(datetime.now())
    app_insight_logger.add_table_result(
        delta_table_name=target_table,
        insert_count=insert_count,
        update_count=update_count,
        delete_count=delete_count,
        table_result="failed",
        start_exec_time=start_exec_time,
        end_exec_time=end_exec_time,
        error_message=error_message
    )
    
    # Exit with the JSON result
    mssparkutils.notebook.exit(app_insight_logger.generate_processing_results())
# Generate and exit with final logging results
